sentences.cn: 他摆出了目空一切的神气.

sentences.en: Her eyebrows were arched in supercilious surprise.
sentences.cn: 大吃一惊的她高傲地扬起了眉毛。

sentences.en: His manner is supercilious and arrogant.
His manner was often offensively supercilious, and then again modest and self - effacing, almost tremulous.
sentences.cn: 他的态度常常起初是敌对地傲慢的, 跟着又谦逊、自卑而几乎畏缩下来.

sentences.en: His mother eyed me in silence with a supercilious air ( Tobias Smollett ).
sentences.cn: 他母亲以一种目空一切的架势一声不响地盯着我 ( 托比阿斯斯摩莱特 )

sentences.en: His mother eyed my clothes with a supercilious air.
sentences.cn: 他母亲以一种傲慢的态度打量着我的衣着.

sentences.en: I am self - confident , but also complacent, I am supercilious, also proud in the meantime.
sentences.cn: 我 自信, 但也自负, 我高傲, 同时也骄傲.

sentences.en: I resent your supercilious and arrogant attitude.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你这种目中无人的傲慢态度.

sentences.en: Parkman occasionally allows a supercilious tone to creep into his writing.
sentences.cn: 帕克曼间或在文章里流露了高傲的态度.

sentences.en: Parkman occasionally allows a supercilious tone to creep into his writings.
sentences.cn: 帕克曼间或在文章里流露出高傲的态度.

sentences.en: Strong and the developers have completely ignored the supercilious look.
sentences.cn: 全然不顾开发商们的横眉与白眼.

sentences.en: The officer was supercilious and self - conceited.
The shop assistant was very supercilious towards me when I asked for some help.
sentences.cn: 我要买东西招呼售货员时,那个售货员对我不屑一顾.

sentences.en: This supercilious attitude relegates me to the level of the commonplace.
sentences.cn: 这种目空一切的心态把我归入大路货的档次.

words.tran_cn: 目空一切的，高傲的；傲慢的，自大的

trans.tran_en: behaving as if you think that other people are less important than you – used to show disapproval
